title: Common Knowledge in Aqours
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Maan~, I’m sorry, Maki-chan. You’s love for uniforms can be problematic sometimes<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Why do you know that, Kanan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eh? Because You proudly showed those photos to me, so~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Y-, you saw them!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah. It looked great on you. I feel like I can understand why You begged you to wear it~. With that said, I actually also have something to ask of you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Don’t tell me, you have a love for uniforms too, Kanan....!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, no, no. It’s not for uniforms, see, but diving suits!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....Haa?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>When I saw those photos, I thought a diving suit would also fit you well, Maki-chan. Diving is fun too, so come to my place sometimes. I’ll teach you everything♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What in the world are you people.... But, maybe I’m sort of interested in diving....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
